verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During a short visit to the Houston area on Thursday] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: met] [ARG1: with some of the families of the victims killed in the Santa Fe High School shooting and some of the survivors who were in the school at the time of the shooting] .

During a short visit to the Houston area on Thursday , President Trump met with some of the families of [ARG1: the victims] [V: killed] [ARGM-LOC: in the Santa Fe High School shooting] and some of the survivors who were in the school at the time of the shooting .

During a short visit to the Houston area on Thursday , President Trump met with some of the families of the victims killed in the Santa Fe High School shooting and some of [ARG1: the survivors] [R-ARG1: who] [V: were] [ARG2: in the school] [ARGM-TMP: at the time of the shooting] .
